description: NocoDB is an open-source platform that transforms databases into smart spreadsheets, enabling users to manage and collaborate on data with a no-code interface.
name: nocoDb
title: NocoDB

actions.description: Creates a new records in the specified table.
actions.name: createRecords
actions.title: Create Records

actions.description: Deletes existing records in the specified table.
actions.name: deleteRecords

properties.description: ID of the records to delete.
properties.name: recordId

actions.description: Gets a record from the specified table.
actions.name: getRecord

properties.description: ID of the record to retrieve.
properties.name: recordId
properties.label: Record ID

properties.description: Fields to include in the response. By default, all the fields are included in the response.
properties.name: fields
properties.label: Fields

actions.title: Get Record

actions.description: Updates existing records in the specified table.
actions.name: updateRecords
actions.title: Update Records
